title: MCPC1.7.2删除MOD后地图无法开启，添加相同的MOD又提示错误
author: gamerteam
txt_content:
如果装上这个MOD，MCPC就会提示
11.05 19:04:02 [Server] INFO Alternatively start the server with -Dfml.queryResult=confirm or -Dfml.queryResult=cancel to preselect the answer.
11.05 19:04:02 [Server] INFO Run the command /fml confirm or or /fml cancel to proceed.
11.05 19:04:02 [Server] INFO battlegear2:mace.iron
11.05 19:04:02 [Server] INFO battlegear2:spear.wood
11.05 19:04:02 [Server] INFO battlegear2:item.battlegear2:shield.diamond
11.05 19:04:02 [Server] INFO battlegear2:waraxe.wood
…………


装上这些MOD又要提示mod IDs are missing

希望大家能帮忙下
